languages.text: {n}Тень печальной улыбки мелькает и сразу тает на лице сенешаля.{/n} "Для Вольного Торговца разумно иметь тайники, в которых можно сберечь важную информацию. И совершенно неразумно делиться их координатами даже с самыми приближенными лицами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Тень печальной улыбки мелькает и сразу тает на лице сенешаля.{/n} "Для Вольного Торговца разумно иметь тайники, в которых можно сберечь важную информацию. И совершенно неразумно делиться их координатами даже с самыми приближенными лицами".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}The shadow of a sad smile appears and immediately vanishes from the Seneschal's face.{/n} "It is wise for a Rogue Trader to have caches where they can safely store important information. And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."
languages.original_text: {n}Тень печальной улыбки мелькает и сразу тает на лице сенешаля.{/n} "Для Вольного Торговца разумно иметь тайники, в которых можно сберечь важную информацию. И совершенно неразумно делиться их координатами даже с самыми приближенными лицами".

And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}La sombra de una sonrisa entristecida aparece y enseguida se desvanece del rostro del senescal.{/n} «Todo Comerciante Independiente ha de tener la precaución de disponer escondrijos en los que guardar información vital, y también la sensatez de no revelar las coordenadas de tales escondrijos, ni siquiera a personas de confianza».
languages.original_text: {n}The shadow of a sad smile appears and immediately vanishes from the Seneschal's face.{/n} "It is wise for a Rogue Trader to have caches where they can safely store important information. And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sombra de una sonrisa entristecida aparece y enseguida se desvanece del rostro del senescal.{/n} «Todo Comerciante Independiente ha de tener la precaución de disponer escondrijos en los que guardar información vital, y también la sensatez de no revelar las coordenadas de tales escondrijos, ni siquiera a personas de confianza».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長の顔に悲しい笑みの影が現れ、瞬時に消えた。{/n}「自由開拓者が大事な情報を安全に保管できる隠し場所を持つことは賢明です。そして、そのような隠し場所の座標を、たとえもっとも信頼できる仲間であっても、誰かと共有するのはまったくもって賢明ではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}The shadow of a sad smile appears and immediately vanishes from the Seneschal's face.{/n} "It is wise for a Rogue Trader to have caches where they can safely store important information. And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長の顔に悲しい笑みの影が現れ、瞬時に消えた。{/n}「自由開拓者が大事な情報を安全に保管できる隠し場所を持つことは賢明です。そして、そのような隠し場所の座標を、たとえもっとも信頼できる仲間であっても、誰かと共有するのはまったくもって賢明ではありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}总领脸上浮现出了一抹悲伤的笑意，但随后立刻消失了。{/n}“对于行商浪人而言，拥有隐秘的藏匿处，用来存储重要信息，这确实是明智之举。可如果藏匿处的坐标告诉任何人，哪怕是告诉自己最信任的盟友，都是极其不明智的举动。”
languages.original_text: {n}The shadow of a sad smile appears and immediately vanishes from the Seneschal's face.{/n} "It is wise for a Rogue Trader to have caches where they can safely store important information. And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."

traits.locale_text: {n}总领脸上浮现出了一抹悲伤的笑意，但随后立刻消失了。{/n}“对于行商浪人而言，拥有隐秘的藏匿处，用来存储重要信息，这确实是明智之举。可如果藏匿处的坐标告诉任何人，哪怕是告诉自己最信任的盟友，都是极其不明智的举动。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'ombre d'un sourire empreint de tristesse traverse brièvement le visage du sénéchal.{/n} « C'est faire preuve de sagesse pour une libre-marchande que d'avoir des caches où conserver précieusement des informations importantes, et d'une grande imprudence que d'en révéler les coordonnées à ses associés, aussi fiables soient-ils. »
languages.original_text: {n}The shadow of a sad smile appears and immediately vanishes from the Seneschal's face.{/n} "It is wise for a Rogue Trader to have caches where they can safely store important information. And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ombre d'un sourire empreint de tristesse traverse brièvement le visage du sénéchal.{/n} « C'est faire preuve de sagesse pour une libre-marchande que d'avoir des caches où conserver précieusement des informations importantes, et d'une grande imprudence que d'en révéler les coordonnées à ses associés, aussi fiables soient-ils. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Anflug eines traurigen Lächelns erscheint auf dem Gesicht des Truchsess und verschwindet sofort wieder.{/n} "Es ist für jeden Freihändler ratsam, geheime Lager anzulegen, in denen er wichtige Informationen lagern kann. Und alles andere als ratsam, die Koordinaten solcher Lager mit anderen zu teilen, selbst mit den treuesten Verbündeten."
languages.original_text: {n}The shadow of a sad smile appears and immediately vanishes from the Seneschal's face.{/n} "It is wise for a Rogue Trader to have caches where they can safely store important information. And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."

Und alles andere als ratsam, die Koordinaten solcher Lager mit anderen zu teilen, selbst mit den treuesten Verbündeten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The shadow of a sad smile appears and immediately vanishes from the Seneschal's face.{/n} "It is wise for a Rogue Trader to have caches where they can safely store important information. And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."

languages.text: {n}Seneşal'in yüzünde hüzünlü bir tebessüm belirip akabinde siliniyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'in güvenli yerlerde mühim malumatları saklayabileceği zulalar bulundurması makuldür. Bu zulaların konumunu başka kişilerle paylaşmasıysa akla uymaz. Söz konusu kişilere yürekten güvense bile."
languages.original_text: {n}The shadow of a sad smile appears and immediately vanishes from the Seneschal's face.{/n} "It is wise for a Rogue Trader to have caches where they can safely store important information. And utterly unwise to share the coordinates of such caches with anyone, even one's most trusted associates."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal'in yüzünde beliren hüzünlü tebessüm, akabinde siliniyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'in güvenli yerlerde mühim malumatları saklayabileceği zulalar bulundurması makuldür. Bu zulaların konumunu başka kişilerle paylaşmasıysa akla uymaz. Söz konusu kişilere yürekten güvense bile."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
